thread.title: Honolulu tourist rescues drowning dog after waves crash into it in video
thread.title_full: Honolulu tourist rescues drowning dog after waves crash into it in video | Daily Mail Online

author: Jake Polden For Mailonline
title: Honolulu tourist rescues drowning dog after waves crash into it in video
text:
1
View
comments
This is the incredible moment a brave tourist rescued a small dog after two powerful waves crashed into it and carried it out to sea.
Holidaymakers to Honolulu looked on in horror as the pooch was swept up in the first freak wave and knocked off a cliff in China Walls.
The video of the incident, which was filmed on a passing drone, shows the dog being battered by the water before a man swims out to it and rescues it from drowning.
Cute dog is rescued from huge waves off cliff face The dog was filmed by the drone walking along the rocks moments before it was hit by the first large wave
The dog appeared to spot the large wave coming and made an effort to get out of its way before running up the rocks
In the clip, the pooch notices the large wave coming towards it and attempts to get to higher ground.
Unable to move out of the way in time, the dog is swept up in the swell and carried along the jagged rocks sticking out from the cliff side.
 Next The water is ruff! Clever dog named Rosie uses plastic... I can feel the beat! Sleeping toddler springs to life and... Curious sloth appears to take SELFIE after holding onto the... Who needs enemies? Prankster powers up CHAINSAW and holds it... Throughout the video it is difficult to track the progress of the dog due to the fact that it is submerged under the water.
But after the second wave passes, the outline of the pooch – struggling to keep its head above water – becomes visible.
The first wave crashed into the dog and dragged it out to sea alongside the jagged rocks of the cliff
The second wave hit the dog and carried it further out to sea while submerging it under the water
The dog appears to be disorientated and in a panic begins paddling off in the wrong direction.
It is at this moment that a tourist – who witnesses the incident taking place – swims out to the animal’s location to rescue it.
As he approaches, the dog remarkably appears to understand the man’s intentions and actually swims towards him.
The tourist then scoops the dog up under his arm and begins heading back to the cliffs with it before lifting it up to another man who places it back on the rocks.
The outline of the dog - struggling to keep its head above water - was barely visible after the two waves had passed
The tourist swam out to the dog, who rather remarkably, paddled over towards him so that it could be rescued
The video concludes with the dog – still disorientated by the incident – hobbling over towards a woman who reaches out to give it a stroke.
Since being posted to YouTube, the video has received a number of comments from people impressed by the quick reactions of the tourist.
User Dan Quote: : 'Just awesome. As they say, faith in humanity restored.'
While Viki said: 'We need more people like this to world.'
The tourist managed to scoop the dog up under his arm and swam with it to a man standing on the cliff side
The video concluded with the disorientated dog walking towards a woman on the cliff side and being petted
